text: Ta expose lytsemiry komu buly kazani, buly "Prybuti biy v im'ya BOHA, abo roblyatʹ vnesok." Vony skazaly, "Yakshcho b my znaly yak borotysʹ, my by pryyednalysya do vas." Vony buly blyzhchi disbelief todi nizh vony musyatʹ vira. Vony vymovyly z yikhnimy hyrlamy shcho buly ne u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh. BOH znaye shcho vony prykhovuyutʹ
